title: Countering Social Media Disinformation
description: An IO officer detects an adversary-controlled bot network spreading disinformation about troop movements on social media.

tasks.description: Analyze the social media posts to identify the specific narratives and hashtags being used by the bot network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly identifies the key elements of the disinformation campaign.

tasks.description: Develop a counter-messaging campaign using verified information and authentic military accounts to debunk the disinformation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a plan to release truthful counter-information.

tasks.description: Report the bot network to the social media platform for takedown.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer submits a comprehensive report to the platform's trust and safety team.
